OrgName.entry: PILATES AND YOGA CLASSES - PONDS FORGE INTERNATIONAL SPORTS CENTRE

Desc.entry: Get fit with like minded individuals in the new group fitness studios which have semi-sprung floors and air conditioning. Offers pilates, yoga and body balance classes for the mind, body and soul. An opportunity to relax, re-energize, stretch, improve flexibility and balance, lengthen and tone your entire body.
